<?xml version="1.0"?> <!--Written by C. Burg 3/13/2002 -->
<!-- ================================================================== Filter to construct a DocTitle for a Organization Document. =================================================================== -->
<xsl:transform xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version = "1.0" xmlns:cdr="cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr"> <xsl:output method="text"/>
<!-- ================================================================ Extract the Organization Name;ShortName;city;city suffix; state or country if no state ================================================================ -->
<xsl:template match="Organization">
<!-- ============================================================= Select the Organization name ============================================================== -->
<xsl:for-each select="OrganizationNameInformation"> <xsl:value-of select="OfficialName/Name"/>;<xsl:text/> <xsl:if test="ShortName/Name"> <xsl:value-of select="ShortName/Name"/>;<xsl:text/> </xsl:if> </xsl:for-each> <!-- ================================================================ Select the location that matches the CIPSContact. =============================================================== -->
<xsl:for-each select="OrganizationLocations"> <xsl:variable name="Cipscontact" select="CIPSContact"/> <xsl:variable name="locId" select="OrganizationLocation/@cdr:id"/>
<!-- ================================================================ Select the city, city suffix, state, and when no state the country. ================================================================ -->
<xsl:if test="OrganizationLocation/Location[@cdr:id=$Cipscontact]"> <xsl:value-of select="OrganizationLocation/Location/PostalAddress/City"/>;<xsl:text/> <xsl:if test="OrganizationLocation/Location/PostalAddress/CitySuffix"> <xsl:value-of select="OrganizationLocation/Location/PostalAddress/CitySuffix"/>;<xsl:text/> </xsl:if> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains(OrganizationLocation/Location/PostalAddress/PoliticalSubUnit_State/@cdr:ref, 'CDR')"> <xsl:variable name="StateID" select="OrganizationLocation/Location/PostalAddress/PoliticalSubUnit_State/@cdr:ref"/> <xsl:variable name="StateInfo" select="document(concat('cdrx:',$StateID))"/> <xsl:apply-templates select="$StateInfo/PoliticalSubUnit/PoliticalSubUnitFullName"/><xsl:text/> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>
<xsl:if test="OrganizationLocation/Location/PostalAddress/Country"> <xsl:if test="contains(OrganizationLocation/Location/PostalAddress/Country/@cdr:ref, 'CDR')"> <xsl:variable name="CountryID" select="OrganizationLocation/Location/PostalAddress/Country/@cdr:ref"/> <xsl:variable name="CountryInfo" select="document(concat('cdrx:',$CountryID))"/> <xsl:apply-templates select="$CountryInfo/Country/CountryFullName"/> </xsl:if> </xsl:if> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:if> </xsl:for-each>
</xsl:template> </xsl:transform>
